columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the volume.

columns.name: volume_type
columns.description: The volume type. This can be gp2 for General Purpose SSD, io1 or io2 for Provisioned IOPS SSD, st1 for Throughput Optimized HDD, sc1 for Cold HDD, or standard for Magnetic volumes.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: The time stamp when volume creation was initiated.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The Availability Zone for the volume.

columns.name: encrypted
columns.description: Indicates whether the volume is encrypted.

columns.name: fast_restored
columns.description: Indicates whether the volume was created using fast snapshot restore.

columns.name: iops
columns.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) that the volume supports.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) that was used to protect the volume encryption key for the volume.

columns.name: multi_attach_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether Amazon EBS Multi-Attach is enabled.

columns.name: outpost_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Outpost.

columns.name: size
columns.description: The size of the volume, in GiBs.

columns.name: snapshot_id
columns.description: The snapshot from which the volume was created, if applicable.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the volume.
